summary: This is a forwarded email chain from March 9, 2020, regarding the Jeffrey Epstein case. Attorney John Ray of Ray, Mitev & Associates sends an attachment (likely a document) to an unspecified recipient, asking who at the Southern District of New York (SDNY) to forward it to. The email includes legal disclaimers about confidentiality and attorney-client privilege.

persons.name: John Ray

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein

keyFacts: Attorney John Ray of Ray, Mitev & Associates sent an email on March 9, 2020, regarding the Jeffrey Epstein case.
The email includes an attachment named 'Jeffrey_Epstein.pdf' and asks who at the Southern District of New York (SDNY) to forward the correspondence to.
The communication is marked as privileged and confidential attorney-client communication and/or attorney work product.
The law firm has offices in Manhattan and Miller Place, New York.
The email chain shows an attempt to share case-related information with federal prosecutors in SDNY.
